properties.Name: DimFacility
properties.Description: A retail/channel location where products, goods and services are sold to consumers.

Columns.Name: FacilityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Store.

Columns.Name: FacilityName
Columns.Description: The business name of the store.

Columns.Name: StoreShortName
Columns.Description: The business name of the store.

Columns.Name: LocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: OperatedByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: GrossFloorArea
Columns.Description: The total floor area of the Store including display and support areas such as stock keeping, dressing rooms and building functions.

Columns.Name: NonsellingArea
Columns.Description: The total non-selling square footage of the associated Store.

Columns.Name: AvailableSellingArea
Columns.Description: The total selling area within the Store expressed in square footage.

Columns.Name: StoreTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Store Type.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.
